document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">An </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Antiquated </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Tree </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">cherished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Crow. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Because </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Junior </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Foliage </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">disrespectful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">venerable </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Birds </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">Corporation </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Coat </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">decorate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Oblivion's </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Fantastic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48dc40">Consulate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: An antiquated tree
